mapper.select: select serial_number as serialNumber, device_os as deviceOs, device_version as deviceVersion, push_token_key as pushTokenKey, registration_date as registrationDate from device_information where serial_number > #{prevPk}

select push_message_no as pushMessageNo, title, body, image, is_sent as isSent, device_information_no as deviceInformationNo, (select di.push_token_key from device_information di where di.device_information_no = device_information_no) as pushTokenKey from push_message where is_sent = FALSE ORDER BY push_message_no ASC
update push_message set is_sent = TRUE where is_sent = FALSE and push_message_no = #{pushMessageNo}
